page.title: 01Northwest of Dumfries
page.content: A very green patchwork, unchanged for decades, but for the massive transmitter - A landmark for miles around, this shining silver monster sits astride the hilltop, below there is forestry, protection the game birds being reared by gamekeepers for the Autumn shoot. sheep, dairy and beef cattle occupy the margial farmland, and better pasture on the lower levels. Silage, hay and barley are all cultivated and all have sufered in this years excesive rains. Very few houses in this block, but it is now poular to renovate properties, cottages, built in the eighteenth century and until recently derelict.
